column1: no  consequence  that  the  proceedings  had  been  formally  conducted  for  they  are
In Munasinghe and another v Mohammed Jabir Navaz Careem [(1990) 2 Sri LR 163], the
judgment of the District Court had been entered in November 1975 and the plain(cid:415)ﬀ had
passed away in July 1980 pending the hearing of the appeal. No steps had been taken to
subs(cid:415)tute the deceased plain(cid:415)ﬀ. The ma(cid:425)er was argued before the Court of Appeal in
January 1987 and the plain(cid:415)ﬀ had even been represented by Counsel. The judgment of
the Court of Appeal was delivered in March 1987 and the plain(cid:415)ﬀ was subs(cid:415)tuted only
a(cid:332)er the case record was sent back to the District Court.
